test.name: POST and DELETE Request With Json

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://admin:admin@acceptance.squashtest.org/nightly-mariadb/squash-tm/api/rest/latest/test-automation-servers path_url=/nightly-mariadb/squash-tm/api/rest/latest/test-automation-servers headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '83', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4='} body=b'{"name": "Request", "url": "https://github.com/AdrianANDRE/RobotTestCharacter.git"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: DELETE
